body:
Comment 4 by **fam.haugland**: 
Yes, I belive we have SELinux enabled. This is a Redhat Enterprice 4 desktop. I also 
tried to compile an example program. The compilation/linking went ok, however, it 
failed when trying to run the executable. Do you plan to make a fix for this SELinux 
problem. In the meantime, I will ask internally if it is possible to run the magic 
command you adviced : setsebool -P allow_execstack 1. I did not find the command on 
my system.
